text: 13.2: Mt 17.20; 21.21; Mk 11.23; Ru 17.6; 1 Ko 12.8-10; 12.28Gu vhɨra maaŋ muuŋgip, Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma buni nzuai mbugum buni suaŋv, gu vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme mba vhagi buni guari, gu nta kaŋgip, gu vhɨra za Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar wo ŋaara mbui tɨvi, gu nta kaŋgip, gu vhɨra guigira Zisas khothɨgi ndɨkndɨk guigira havhargip, gu kha mbɨkshɨɨ ga suaŋrim, nta khaŋ thav, siv, harigi ŋanin ŋgɨrga. Gu maaŋ muuŋv, gu won ndavar harigi gumgi gu mbigi ga ndɨɨi fhu, gu fhura ki ne ma.
